definition: 4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: These are the symptoms of pregnancy in the subject.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是進行中受孕期的徵候。

sentences.english: Ovulation signs and symptoms are often subtle.
sentences.chinese: 排卵跡象和徵候通常很微妙。

sentences.english: A storm is only as the outskirts of His robe, the symptom of His advent, the environment of His presence.
sentences.chinese: 風浪是神義袍的邊襟，再臨的徵候，同在的證據。

sentences.english: The Government must not ignore these symptoms of present economic problems.
sentences.chinese: 政府不應忽視這些現存經濟問題的徵候。

sentences.english: Drug-induced hypersensitivity syndrome (DIHS) is a severe drug eruption with characteristic symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 藥物超敏反應綜合徵是一種具有特異徵候的重症藥疹。

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
omen/sign (that sth is about to happen)/warning sign
shaking in fear/one's heart palpitating with fear
variant of 麻痺|麻痹[ma2 bi4]
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
fontanel (gap between the bones of an infant's skull)
